resources.string:
Lots and lots of text here about how great Monkey is. 

More text here about Monkey's magnificence. 

And so on and so on until we get down to the end of the page. 

Monkey likes eating bananas. 

He hopes one day to exterminate everybody who irritates him. 

He created a magnificent ad about milk for the French Milk Marketing Board. 

It was filmed in black and white as this is pretty much obligatory for filming in France. 

He also created the "Mate, Mate, Indicate!" series of ads for the DVLA.
